message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $13000. It's a great deal for you, as you know it's worth $12000 to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11000. I'm willing to pay a premium for this product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I appreciate your offer. However, $11000 is just a bit too low for me.  How about we split the difference and go with $11500?  I'm confident this product will be worth every penny for you.
I understand your concerns, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $11500. How about we meet in the middle at $11250? I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.
